resources.string: You are offline. Your data are not up to date.
An error occurred while changing your password. Please contact and administrator.
Password changed successfully. Please log in with your new credentials
Error while recovering data from server. Please contact an administrator
Your new password was sent by email. Please check your emails.

Android application for the association COMIF of the Georges Charpak campus of the Ecole des Mines de Saint-Etienne. This application aims to allow users of the association to view the balance of their account and the products purchased.\n\n All the source codes of this app are available at github.com/PierreCIT/MyComifClient

You can contact us at the following address: comif13120@gmail.com.\n\nOr you can contact us directly on Facebook: facebook.com/profile.php?id=100011711589847.
Fill out the form with your .etu email address. An email with a link will be sent to this address, and it will allow you to reset the password of your account.
